abstract: The company’s new board members are expected to add diversity and new perspective to the board, which was criticized for its handling of the ouster of its former chief executive.
snippet: The company’s new board members are expected to add diversity and new perspective to the board, which was criticized for its handling of the ouster of its former chief executive.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Hewlett-Packard announced a major boardroom shake-up on Thursday in the aftermath of the forced resignation of Mark V. Hurd as its chief executive.

headline.main: H.P. Replaces 4 on Its Board in Wake of Chief’s Dismissal
headline.print_headline: H.P. Replaces 4 on Its Board In Wake of Chief’s Dismissal
